channel.title: Emma Juettner - Net Art Links
channel.description: Net Art Links Collected by Emma

item.description: A speculative fiction story about space probes and American football, by Jon Bois. This is such a cool story, I promise even if you do not know or care about football you will get drawn in. Seriously, click the link and scroll down for a bit and tell me you are not intrigued. Link.
